quest.name: Thou Must Live, Die, and Know
journal: Venat is watching you in quiet contemplation.
objectives: Report to Krile in the main hall of the Baldesion Annex.

dialogue.name: VENAS
dialogue.text: Forename, listen to me. Our duty now is not to denounce Hermes for his misguided determination, or to convince Emet-Selch and Hythlodaeus that they have been deceived.

dialogue.name: VENAS
dialogue.text: No, we must instead ensure that the experiences Hermes sought to expunge are preserved.

dialogue.name: VENAS
dialogue.text: What remains in our memories alone will be our weapon against the Final Days.

dialogue.name: VENAS
dialogue.text: You must fight this battle in your age, and I in mine...

dialogue.name: VENAS
dialogue.text: Come, let us walk together once more. I will see you to the doors of Propylaion.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Your time in this age is drawing to an end.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: Upon speaking to Venat, several cutscenes will play in sequence.

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: It is recommended that you set aside sufficient time to view these scenes in their entirety.

dialogue.name: Q1
dialogue.text: Continue with the main scenario quest?

dialogue.name: TATARU
dialogue.text: You've a knack for turning up exactly when needed, and this is no exception!

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: I'd heard you were off in the First as part of our efforts to investigate the Final Days.

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: Well, as so often seems to be the case, while you were away, we've had some few developments...

dialogue.name: KRILE
dialogue.text: ...Which we can discuss in just a moment. For now, however, I cannot tell you how wonderful it is to have you back!
